title: Internal Search
description: Used for internal site searches and includes all related search behaviors and details.

xdm:autocompleteSearch.title: Search Autocomplete Value
xdm:autocompleteSearch.description: Tracks when a visitor uses a suggested/autocompleted search value to execute the search

xdm:numberofSearchResults.title: Number of Results
xdm:numberofSearchResults.description: Count of the total number of search results returned.

xdm:productFindingMethods.title: Search Product Finding Method
xdm:productFindingMethods.description: The internal search term value with merchandising binding. Will show what term was searched for immediately before viewing a product.

xdm:refineSearch.title: Refinement Value
xdm:refineSearch.description: Number of times an internal search refinement has occurred.

xdm:refineType.title: Search Refinement Type
xdm:refineType.description: Captures the refinement type(s) applied to the search results (i.e. department, brand, price, in-store, review rating, color, material, etc.)

xdm:resultsPageNumber.title: Search Results Page Number
xdm:resultsPageNumber.description: For paginated search results, tracks the page of results the visitor is viewing.

xdm:search.title: Search Event
xdm:search.description: Number of times an internal search has occurred.

xdm:searchLocation.title: Search Location in Page
xdm:searchLocation.description: When multiple search boxes exist on the page, this value should be used to identify the specific location the user used to search

xdm:searchNullSearch.title: Null Search Event
xdm:searchNullSearch.description: Number of times an internal search has occurred that provided zero results.

xdm:searchPostalCode.title: Search Postal Code
xdm:searchPostalCode.description: Captures the zip code used for a search, if applicable

xdm:searchRadius.title: Search Radius
xdm:searchRadius.description: Captures the selected distance of the search radius.

xdm:searchTerm.title: Search Term
xdm:searchTerm.description: Tracks the internal search term entered by the visitor.

xdm:searchTermClick.title: Search Autocomplete Clicked
xdm:searchTermClick.description: For autocomplete scenarios, users sometimes abandon their search and click a specific term from the drop down. This event tracks when a search term in clicked instead of when a search is executed

xdm:searchTermClicked.title: Search Autocomplete Clicked Value
xdm:searchTermClicked.description: For autocomplete scenarios, users sometimes abandon their search and click a specific term from the drop down. This value is used to track the specific terms clicked

xdm:searchTermTyped.title: Search Autocomplete Typed Value
xdm:searchTermTyped.description: For autocomplete scenarios, users sometimes abandon their search and click a specific term from the drop down. This value tracks what the user started to type in order to generate the specific set of suggested search terms

xdm:searchType.title: Search Type
xdm:searchType.description: Captures the method of search being executed, if applicable. Examples could include a type-ahead search, directly-typed search, or any other type of custom search functionalitya site might have.

xdm:sort.title: Search Sort Value
xdm:sort.description: Capture when a sort value has been applied to the list of search results.

xdm:sortType.title: Search Sort Type
xdm:sortType.description: Captures the type of sort applied to search results, i.e. best match, price, rating, etc.

xdm:typeAhead.title: Search Type Ahead Value
xdm:typeAhead.description: Tracks the suggested/autocompleted search value to execute the search
